description.en:
$USP is an algorithmic stable token pegged 1:1 to $USDC on Aurora blockchain. $USP is one of our many pegged tokens in Polaris ecosystem with more tokens coming in the future. 

$USP is designed to follow the price of $USDC while pushing the price up and down to keep it close to the peg.
